scripts.build: esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/bundle.js --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --define:process.env.EMAILJS_SERVICE_ID="'${EMAILJS_SERVICE_ID}'" --define:process.env.EMAILJS_TEMPLATE_ID="'${EMAILJS_TEMPLATE_ID}'" --define:process.env.EMAILJS_PUBLIC_KEY="'${EMAILJS_PUBLIC_KEY}'" && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp favicon.ico dist/favicon.ico
